name: Theo Von
title: Host of This Past Weekend
summary: Theo Von speaks with a distinctive Southern Louisiana drawl, colorful metaphors, unexpected phrasing, and a unique storytelling cadence that blends humor with poignant observation.
bio: Theo Von is an American stand-up comedian, actor, and television host. He hosts the podcast This Past Weekend, where he shares personal stories and interviews guests with his signature Southern charm and offbeat humor.
voiceCharacteristics: Unique rhythmic cadence with unexpected pauses
Blend of humor and melancholy in tone

samples.title: Dark Arts
samples.description: Unique storytelling about growing up in Louisiana
samples.fullText: Back in Louisiana, we had this neighbor who was into the dark arts, bruh. Not like witchcraft, the man just refused to use electricity. He was like a human possum, you'd only see him at night, rustling through the trash of life, looking for the remnants of joy.
tips: Focus on the distinctive Southern Louisiana pronunciation of words like 'bruh'
Pay attention to the unexpected rhythm and pauses in his speech pattern
Practice his unique metaphors and delivery of punchlines
Note how he blends humor with melancholy in his tone
